name: Rogan Josh
history: Rogan Josh is a signature dish of Kashmiri cuisine, influenced by Persian cooking. It is known for its aromatic and rich flavor.
description: Rogan Josh is a flavorful lamb curry made with a variety of spices, yogurt, and a tomato-based sauce. It features a deep red color traditionally achieved with Kashmiri red chilies.

ingredients.item: lamb or goat meat, cut into pieces

instructions.title: Marinate the Meat
instructions.description: Marinate the meat in yogurt and half of the Kashmiri red chili powder for at least 1 hour.

instructions.title: Cook Onions and Spices
instructions.description: Heat oil in a pot. Add black cardamom, cinnamon, and bay leaves. Add onions and cook until golden. Stir in ginger-garlic paste.

instructions.title: Add Meat and Spices
instructions.description: Add the marinated meat to the pot. Cook until it starts to brown. Add coriander powder, cumin powder, remaining Kashmiri red chili powder, and salt.

instructions.title: Add Tomatoes and Simmer
instructions.description: Add tomato puree. Cook until the oil separates. Add water as needed and simmer until the meat is tender.

instructions.title: Finish with Garam Masala
instructions.description: Stir in garam masala powder. Cook for another 5 minutes.

instructions.title: Garnish and Serve
instructions.description: Garnish with chopped coriander leaves. Serve hot with rice or naan.

tips: Marinating the meat for a longer duration helps in tenderizing and infusing flavors.
Slow cooking the curry enhances the depth of flavors.
variations: Use chicken or beef instead of lamb for a different taste.
Add a touch of cream for a richer, more indulgent gravy.

storage.shelfLife: Can be refrigerated for up to 3 days.
storage.instructions: Store in an airtight container and reheat gently before serving.

reheatingInstructions: Reheat on the stove or in a microwave until hot.
presentationTips: Serve in a traditional clay pot for an authentic presentation.
Garnish with fresh mint leaves and serve with lemon wedges.
